text.title: Chinese market fire kills seventeen, child detained
text.head: Chinese market fire kills seventeen, child detained
Sources

list.item: He Huifeng. "Hong Kong girl, 14, feared among 17 killed in blaze at Guangdong shopping mall" — South China Morning Post , February 7, 2015
PTI. "China mall fire kills 17" — The Tribune (Chandigarh) , February 7, 2015
"China's deadly shopping blaze 'started by boy, nine'" — BBC News Online , February 6, 2015
AFP. "China shopping mall fire kills at least 17" — The Guardian , February 6, 2015
